T04bsa009_u:1: mañjuśrīye jñānasattvāya namaḥ trailokye vyavahāramātre sati paramarthābhimānāt tattvārthānavagāhibhiḥ sattvairvastusvabhāvavivekadvāreṇāviparyayajñānasaṃprāptaye śāstraracaneyaṃ //
T04bsa009_u:3: tadaṃśān vīkṣya tatrāpi bhrāntā buddhirahāviva // Hvpv_1 (6) //
T04bsa009_u:7: bhrāntamatramataḥ prājñair na cintyaṃ paramārthataḥ // Hvpv_3 (45) //
T04bsa009_u:8: bhrāntaṃ tadapya samyaktvad yathā bhanaṃ tathāsti na /
T04bsa009_u:11: tyajet sa buddhiman suṣthurāgādyahibhayaṃ yathā // Hvpv_5 //
T04bsa009_u:13: kleśan sarvasaṃ tyaktumana yateta paramārthataḥ // Hvpv_6 //
